plot: When Allison puts a newly hired, but criminal, genius in Jack's care he's less than pleased, but then an accident in a lab causes most of GD to lose their smarts, and he may be the only one with the solution.

Zane,a genius who stole millions of dollars, is arrested he is the approached by Allison with an offer that keeps him out of jail which is to work at GD on a project that he's familiar with but because of his criminal history Allison assigns Carter to keep an eye on him but he turns out to be a handful. It turns out the project they are working on is a recreation of the Big Bang. But suddenly everyone working on the project starts acting strangely they are not paying attention to the project and it might go boom unless Carter can figure out how to fix everyone.he thinks Zane did it so he can escape so he tries to find him.—Rcs0411@yahoo.com
